Name: Basic: Light Serum
Des:
Crafting results in either products Lv.1 or Lv.2 with a 50% chance.
This light-distilled Serum is carried by adventurers to amplify their Light strength for a brief duration.

SpecialAward.Name: Alchemy Refine Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: 10% chance to gain 1 extra item when brewing potions or processing elemental particles (Does not apply to Arcane & Knowledge Conversion Potions).

SpecialAward.Name: Alchemy Refine Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: 20% chance to gain 1 extra item when brewing potions or processing elemental particles.

SpecialAward.Name: Alchemy Refine Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 30% chance to gain 1 extra item when brewing potions or processing elemental particles.

recipeVariants.Name: Basic: Light Serum
recipeVariants.Des:
Crafting results in either products Lv.1 or Lv.2 with a 50% chance.
This light-distilled Serum is carried by adventurers to amplify their Light strength for a brief duration.

SpecialAward.Name: Alchemy Refine Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 30% chance to gain 1 extra item when brewing potions or processing elemental particles.

materials.Name: Light Particle Lv.1
materials.Description: Alchemy material used to craft Light Serum and Light Drop.
materials.Description2: A crystal particle of the Light, with Light dancing softly within the crystal. Warmth and hope can be felt through the crystal.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Light Particle Lv.1
lifeSkillSource.Des: Alchemy material used to craft Light Serum and Light Drop. Obtained from Artisanry.

SpecialAward.Name: Alchemy Refine Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: 10% chance to gain 1 extra item when brewing potions or processing elemental particles (Does not apply to Arcane & Knowledge Conversion Potions).

SpecialAward.Name: Alchemy Refine Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: 20% chance to gain 1 extra item when brewing potions or processing elemental particles.

SpecialAward.Name: Alchemy Refine Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 30% chance to gain 1 extra item when brewing potions or processing elemental particles.

materials.Name: Light Crystal Shard Lv.1
materials.Description: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
materials.Description2: A crystal rich in Engram. Easy to collect and process. Due to absorbing Engram from the atmosphere and underground during crystallization, its specific composition and shape vary by region.

materials.Name: Potion Catalyst - ENH
materials.Description: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the elemental attack abilities within raw materials.
materials.Description2: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Potion Catalyst - ENH
lifeSkillSource.Des: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

materials.Name: Buds
materials.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
materials.Description2: In their free-living state, buds exhibit no discernible metabolic activity and exist in a dormant phase characterized as cryptobiosis. Upon encountering favorable environmental conditions, they resume activity and germinate into vegetative cells.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Meadow Mushroom
lifeSkillSource.Des: Found near the massive mechanical ruins at the site of the Andra Landing Battlefield. Looks like tiny umbrellas that protect insects from the weather.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Glowshroom
lifeSkillSource.Des: Growing in damp, shadowy environments, it emits an eerie glow at night.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Granny Pine
lifeSkillSource.Des: A rare underwater fungus regarded as a treasure beneath the sea.

materials.Name: Boiled Water
materials.Description2: Water purified through the process of heating to eliminate impurities.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Boiled Water
lifeSkillSource.Des: Water purified through the process of heating to eliminate impurities.

materials.Name: Limpid Azure Water
materials.Description: Naturally harvested, it can be used in cooking or further processed for a variety of versatile applications.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Baru ore is commonly found within the Towering Ruin. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru Ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Baru ore is commonly found in the core module sector. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru Rich Ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Baru ore is commonly found along the Thunder Cliff Trail. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru pure ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Azte ore is commonly found near the Old Kanamia Tribe. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Azte ore is commonly found on the floating isle at the center of the canyon. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Rich Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Azte ore is commonly found on the north side of Rotgate Courtyard. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Pure Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Luna ore is commonly found near the Scout Lookout Post. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Luna ore is also commonly found around Windwhisper Dome. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Rich Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Luna ore is commonly found on the northern edge of the forest. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Pure Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Stokes Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Stokes ore is commonly found along the Seachime Cliff Trail. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Stokes Rich Ore, which is used to craft Buri Mech Shard.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Stokes Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Stokes ore is commonly found in the forest caves to the south. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Stokes pure ore, which is used to craft Buri Mech Shard.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Raw Ore of Sapphire
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found along the northern shore of Pale Azure Lake, raw ore of Starlight Sapphire Lv.1 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Haste.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Rich Ore of Sapphire
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found along the plank road in Mistveil Gorge, raw ore of Starlight Sapphire Lv.2 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Haste.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Sapphire Cluster
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found along the western edge of the Glade Crevice, raw ore of Starlight Sapphire Lv.3 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Haste.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Raw Ore of Ruby
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found inside the bomb crater at Andra Landing Battlefield, raw ore of Starlight Ruby Lv.1 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enchancing Crit.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Rich Ore of Ruby
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found in supply module zones, raw ore of Starlight Ruby Lv.2 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Crit.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Ruby Cluster
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found on the western Crystal Slope, raw ore of Starlight Ruby Lv.3 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Crit.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Raw Ore of Topaz
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found around the giant vines near the Kanamia Tribe, raw ore of Starlight Diamond Lv.1 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Luck.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Rich Ore of Topaz
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found in stability control module zones, raw ore of Starlight Diamond Lv.2 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays forgear, enhancing Luck.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Topaz Cluster
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found on the eastern Crystal Slope, raw ore of Starlight Diamond Lv.3 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Luck .

lifeSkillSource.Name: Raw Ore of Emerald
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found near the Statue of the Hero, raw ore of Starlight Emerald Lv.1 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Expertise.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Rich Ore of Emerald
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found on floating isles, raw ore of Starlight Emerald Lv.2 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Expertise.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Emerald Cluster
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found in western mine shafts, raw ore of Starlight Emerald Lv.3 can be gathered when focused. Once refined, these crystals serve as gem inlays for gear, enhancing Expertise.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Limestone
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly found near the Forbidden Zone of Kanamia, these weathered white stones rest in quiet stillness, with time etching mottled textures into the sedimentary rock layers.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Slate
lifeSkillSource.Des: Commonly seen around Canyon Camp, these weathered slab-like stones rest in quiet stillness, with time etching mottled textures into the sedimentary rock layers.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Granite
lifeSkillSource.Des: Born of molten lava near the southern cliff trail, these rocks now lie in solemn stillness-their sharp edges catching the sunlight, pulsing with the ancient heartbeat of the mountains.
